name: ChilloutCheckers
0:
”Alexa, launch Chillout Checkers”
”Alexa, open Chillout Checkers”
”Alexa, play Chillout Checkers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chillout checkers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Need to unwind? How about a relaxing game of checkers, in a low-pressure chill zone, dripping with lofi hip-hop beats? You call out the moves whenever you're ready, and watch as your AI opponent ponders their life choices. Don't quite remember the rules? Don't worry, a laid back tutorial will remind you of the rules as you go, so just sit back and let the board guide you.

Note: this skill requires an Alexa device with a screen.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
